text: Yakhana tadera kache amara suspasta ayata samuha tela'oyata kara haya, takhana tara bale, tomadera bapa-dadara yara ebadata karata e lokati ye ta theke tomaderake badha dite caya. Tara ara'o bale, eta managara mithya bai naya. Ara kapheradera kache yakhana satya agamana kare, takhana tara bale, eto eka suspasta yadu.
